# libminer

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of libminer is to provide an overview of your R library setup. It is 
a toy package that is part of a workshop.

## Installation

You can install the development version of libminer from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("mcanova-usgs/libminer")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:
Use `lib_summary()`.

```{r example}
library(libminer)
## basic example code
```
